info.title: Open Close account
info.transfers_description: In Spain and the EU, in euros.
info.card_description: Become a client and get it totally free with your checking account if you are the first owner.
info.phone_description: Enter your Openbank cards on your mobile or smart watch and pay at any contactless reader
info.almost_done: You're almost there! To complete the contracting of your OpenClose Current Account product, you will be required to generate a password that you can specify in the next step.

form.title: Create your password manager
form.info: To complete the contracting of your OpenClose Current Account product, you must specify a password that you will use in your administrator account.
form.info2: This account will have access to the entire catalog of your product.
form.clue_info: You can also optionally enter a hint that will be used if at any time you do not remember the password. this hint will be required to be able to restore the password
